expo.name: AdoPetion
expo.description: This is a 100% free, non-profit app that help both you and your dream pet meet each other.

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Your current location will be used for search area display, distance calculation, and explore results
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Your current location will be used for search area display, distance calculation, and explore results
